"ТОРТ ЭТО ЛОЖЬ!"

Уникальная игра в своём жанре, с революционной (для своего времени) механиками и весьма неочевидным, но цепляющим сюжетом, или скорее "лором". Кроме того, игра неплохо заставляет шевелить мозгами, т.к. по большей части состоит из кучи головоломок - а этом плане подходит даже тем, кто впринципе не особо любит игры. Очень надеюсь что намеки на связь с миром "Half-Life" в игре не случайно - это было бы отличным дополнением к мрачной вселенной "Халфы".

"Portal" это одна из тех игр, которая запоминается навсегда. Игра максимально минималистична - в ней нет ничего лишнего, при этом, она то и дело удивляет - то, что начинается на вид как обычный инди-пазл - к концу становиться проектом, который хочется забыть, чтобы снова пережить эмоции, которые испытываешь впервые проходя игру. В общем ТОП!

포탈건을 이용하여 스테이지를 클리어해야하는게임, 총 19단계로 이루어져 있으며 플레이하는 내내 포탈이라는 참신하고 어찌보면 간단한 주제를 가지고 복잡한 스테이지를 클리어 할때는 정말 가끔 소름이 돋을떄가 있다. 마지막에 실험실을 탈출하여 글라도스에게 갈떄와 글라도스 보스전에서는 내가 여태 실험실에서 배웠던 잡기술(?)을 가지고 클리어할때는 정말 내가 이 게임을 클리어 했구나 라고 느껴지게 했으며 마지막에 나오는 엔딩곡 still alive에서는 박수가 절로 나오게 되는 게임이다. 자신이 스팀러고, 플레이할 게임이 없다면 꼭 한번 구매해보길 바란다. 내가 3시간만에 클리어했으니, 똑똑한 사람들이라면 2시간도 가능할듯?

Pandemi döneminde çıtır çerezlik bir oyun arıyorsanız alın oynayın derim. Süre olarak kısa olsa da hakkını veriyor.

I'm over 14 years late to playing this game but it really hasn't aged a day (in any way that matters). totally lives up to it's reputation as one of the best puzzle games of all time. 
It's short length is both a blessing and a curse. the game is not too long but always leaves you wanting more (so it's a good thing it got a sequel).
The only possible downside is that the "least steps" challenges can be absurdly finicky but other than that it's a near-perfect game. doing what it wanted to do with a flawless execution.

This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

Amazing. Just amazing. For a game released in 2007, this game has fantastic graphics and a very engaging story. This game in comparison to its sequel, is more of a horror game, than the sequel's more adventurous and dramatic-storyline.
It's a classic and for good reason. It's only a few hours long, but definitely worth it if you have the money.

good game, however it does not even fall into comparison with the second game. This game sets you up for the beauty of the second game, but this is a review for the FIRST game. This game is... a puzzle game. big surprise, i know. But the music, the atmosphere, GLaDOS, and the horror of the game is what drives you to keep on playing. (Not like anyone would ever consider stopping, but it just enhances the experience.) 

I'm not going to spoil the game, but the ending of Portal and Portal 2 are the best endings to any game i have ever seen.

If you have some spare money or some spare time, buy the bundle of Portal and Portal 2, it's just guaranteed that you'll love both and it's permanently five dollars off. 

The game is short, but what this game does in five hours is what many huge development studios cannot put into three hundred hours.

Get the game.

Portal 1: 4/5

Portal 2: 5/5, mastapeeecce.
